data.title: Haider Jasdan on LinkedIn: Life's incredible journey brought me full circle this weekend as I shared…
data.meta_description:
Life's incredible journey brought me full circle this weekend as I shared space at Sai's TA101, an experience that first unfolded for me 8 years ago.

Back…
data.text:
This week’s MindSpa Adventure is more experimental. We had a request for a water-themed experience. Well (pun intended) I'm a big fan of nature metaphors (plus i love water anyway), so i’m 100% up for it – and this journey is what popped into my mind: Remember (even if only vaguely) the water cycle we learned at school? Here it is as a metaphor, a way to explore creation and learning. We use the initial, excitable beginnings to make new thoughts and paths. What happens as thought, energy and intention tumble and flow down to oceans of experience and knowledge? If you’re curious, it’s in the recording. I’d love to know what you make of it. What just happened? The cycle. Listen here for free: https://lnkd.in/eDy6GhC4 (30 mins listen) ——————————— I love the creative challenge that suggestions and requests bring. It helps keep the mindspa adventures fresh and keeps me crafting experiences for you, the listener, instead of just for me. It’s also pretty scary sometimes. I feel a bit uncertain, even self-conscious, about sharing an idea with the world – especially if I haven't had time and early feedback to refine it. Sometimes it feels uncomfortable. This is unavoidable, I suspect, when creating something new and offering it up to people – especially people we don’t yet know. I find it’s an act of trust, of vulnerability. I’m grateful to those who have shared these experiences with me for their curiosity. I'm thrilled every week when you make delightful, moving and insightful experiences out of these ideas. To everyone who’s stayed, if even for a moment, and listened — thank you. To everyone who brought a request or suggestion — thank you. To everyone who took an idea I offered, a seed I helped plant, and grew something beautiful — thank you.

Are you ready to realize your true potential and live authentically? "Activate Your Authenticity" is an empowering journey where you will experience true transformation. This is a 5 day FREE, online event, beginning May 27th, from 1-2 p.m. EST. ➡️Day 1: Feeling Safe to Be Seen and Heard ✔️We'll explore why it's scary to use your voice and how nervous system dysregulation plays a role. ✔️We'll identify sneaky ways we hide behind perfectionism, people-pleasing, and busyness. ✔️We'll also shine a light on the importance of shedding layers of protection and feeling safe in your body. ➡️ Day 2: Releasing People Pleasing ✔️You’ll learn how good girl conditioning blocks our voice, leading to resentment. ✔️We'll do a guided exercise to feel what "yes" and "no" feel like in your body, helping you create healthy boundaries. ➡️ Day 3: Healing Your Inner Child Visibility Wound ✔️We'll unpack moments when we shut down our voice and expression. ✔️We'll explore the impact of repressed anger, resentment, and rage living in the body, and do a potent inner child healing meditation to release it. ➡️ Day 4: Falling in Love with Yourself and Your Body ✔️We'll reconnect with our yin energy, shedding shame and self-judgment of our bodies. ✔️I'll guide you in a naked mirror work practice to deepen self-love. ➡️ Day 5: Rewiring Your Nervous System through Microdosing Mushrooms ✔️We'll explore microdosing and how it rewires the brain and nervous system. ✔️I'll address misconceptions and share integration work to support deep healing. Register here: https://lnkd.in/er6x4ZJK Activate your authenticity! #Authenticity #SelfDiscovery #Empowerment #FreeEvent

Do You Believe in the Law of Attraction? ✨ Every day, I wake up and say, "Today will be a great day." ☀️ Try starting your day by saying 10 things you want to achieve today. 🥇 The Law of Attraction suggests that our thoughts and feelings can attract corresponding experiences into our lives this has worked for me and I wanted to share it with you. Here’s how to make it work for you: Think Positive: Focus on what you want, not what you don’t. What goals do you want to attract today? 🥅 Visualize: Picture your goals as if they’ve already happened. Can you see your dreams becoming reality? 💭 Affirmations: Repeat positive statements about yourself and your goals. What affirmations can you start using today? 💗 Gratitude: Appreciate what you have to attract more good things. What are you grateful for right now? Take Action: Combine positive thinking with proactive steps. What steps can you take today to move closer to your goals? Start today by setting a clear goal, visualising it daily, using affirmations, create a vision board, and maintaining a gratitude journal. Believe in your dreams and watch them manifest! 🙌 Happy Friday beautiful people 🌟 #LawOfAttraction #PositiveThinking #ManifestYourDreams

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐈 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐩 𝐬𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐞𝐥𝐬𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐤? If there's one simple philosophy of life I hold unto, it is that "𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐢𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐰𝐚𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐠𝐞𝐭 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐰𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐩 𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐠𝐞𝐭 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐲 𝐰𝐚𝐧𝐭" Una, who wants the hard way to get things? No one right? Your guess was right as mine then... Each Sunday as a hack to achieve peak performance in the weak ahead, I decide to reflect on how my past days went and look ahead to even do more But in doing so, I reflect on the question posed in my headline Let me bring it here again for emphasis sake 𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐈 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐩 𝐬𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐞𝐥𝐬𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐤? In answering this, I want to bring to light, the Chinese saying, "if you want happiness for a lifetime, help somebody" There are so many ways to help many others You can help someone, just to mention a few, by giving ✅ Your Time ✅ Your Skills ✅ Your Money | Financial resources When you ponder to reflect, do not forget the Golden Rule of Life, "𝐃𝐨 𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐨 𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐚𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐰𝐨𝐮𝐥𝐝 𝐡𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐦 𝐝𝐨 𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐨 𝐲𝐨𝐮.” Just my musings on a Sunday evening... Be More, Do More To Have More 🤛 I Pray For You This Week, That May You Be Refreshed Even As You Go Out There To Refresh Others ❤🙏 My name is Nana Kofi Armoo Quansah, 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐬𝐞𝐭 𝐌𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐨𝐫™ Click my blue name ☝ Follow me to get 1% better to arrange your future as we Reposition our Minds from Prison to Purpose Put on 🔔, so you don't miss out when I post If you got value, kindly repost PS: Mood when it's few minutes to tonight's edition of School of Astounding Results with the Chief SOARer (if there's a word like that 😂), my sis Esther Oyetola 🦅 PS: Check in the comments, I have some Valuehydrates for you cus why not 😋 #Musings #reflection #sundaythoughts

It can be scary to try something new, especially something as hands-on as drumming! Here are ten lessons learned when you choose to try something new (like a drum circle!): 🛡️Resilience: Drumming builds resilience – the beat goes on, and so do you! 🥁💪 💫 Courage: Step out of your comfort zone, embrace the rhythm, and discover a newfound courage within yourself. The drum is your instrument of empowerment. 🌱 Learning and Growth: Drumming is not just a beat; it's a journey of continuous learning and personal growth. 🌍 Open-mindedness: Joining a drum circle introduces you to diverse rhythms and cultures, fostering open-mindedness and breaking down barriers. 🎨 Creativity: Drumming stimulates creativity, encouraging you to march to the beat of your own drum. 🔍 Self-discovery: Unearth hidden talents, passions, and facets of your personality you might not have nurtured otherwise! 🌀Adaptability: Engaging with rhythm teaches adaptability, a crucial skill in navigating life's twists and turns. 🚀 Building Confidence: Every beat is a step toward confidence. Drumming empowers, and the collective energy of being in the circle with others fuels a sense of accomplishment. ⏳ Patience: Drumming isn't just a quick rhythm; it's a journey. Exercise patience as you learn and grow, both individually and collectively. 🤝 Connection with Others 🤝: Drum circles create social symphonies, connecting diverse souls through the universal language of rhythm. Ready to experience the transformative power of drumming? Check out one of our community drum circles for free!

☕️ Coffee Time Conversation: Overcoming and Achieving ☕️ Good morning, friends! Grab your favorite mug and join me, Host LaDonna McAbee, along with the incredible co-host Heather Halverson, as we jump into a heart-to-heart on this week’s Coffee Time chat. 🌞👭 We’re spilling the beans on a topic close to our hearts—overcoming childhood obstacles. We believe that your past doesn't define you; it prepares you. And we're living proof that with the right mindset and clear goals, there's nothing you can't achieve! 💪🏅 📖 We'll share our personal journeys, the lessons learned, and how we've used those experiences to fuel our drive towards success. It's all about turning trials into triumphs! So, let’s talk about setting those goals, shifting our mindset, and stepping into our power. Because sometimes, all you need is a good cup of coffee and a reminder that you are capable of amazing things. ✨ Comment below with your own experiences or questions for us to answer! ☕️🗨️ Let’s Chat Appointment Link: https://lnkd.in/e6SmnAKJ Video Link: https://lnkd.in/gfgnQQiF #CoffeeTime #LaDonnaMcAbee #OvercomingObstacles #MindsetMatters #ChildhoodChallenges

The beginning of a year always brings reflection. 🪄♥️💫To embrace the magic of new beginnings, a positive mindset is a vital for thriving during times of transition. 🏡My family moved this summer. It was so impactful because it was a BIG change. BIG change can impact your entire existence but it can also inspire growth. 📘In my vlog, “Sometimes New Beginnings Start With Good-Bye” (link in first comment), I talk about managing BIG change and how Psychological Safety is a vital element for being able to thrive during times of transition. To celebrate the new year, I’m not making a list of things I want to accomplish in 2024. I’m focusing instead on being grateful for family, friends, good health, and the life I have. ♥️I hope you’re the reason someone feels welcomed, seen, heard, valued, loved and supported. My wish for you in 2024 and always, is to be happy, healthy, loved and living your purpose.♥️ Shine on beautiful people. 🦄 #newbeginnings #psychologicalsafety #mindset #strongwomen #alignment #mindset #empoweringwomen #behindfrenemylines #collaborationovercompetition #authenticity #sisterhood #friendshipcircles #furthertogether #freetheworldfromfrenemies #nomoremeangirls #norivalry #rebuildrelationships #positivechange #betruetoyou #fearlessfemales #makeroom #confidence #bettertogether https://lnkd.in/etsENNwQ

Spiritual reflection and encouragement for the week: As I reflect at the end of 2023 and look forward to 2024, I ponder whether we could build strong connection by disconnecting? get closer by breaking open? feel deeper by thinking less? become more complete by letting go of self? know more by saying less? listen more by judging less? For the spiritual reflection and encouragement this week, I did not quote anyone but ask myself what are the most interesting queries this year. It is interesting how learning is facilitated by unlearning, less is actually more, worldly is inseparable from the transcendental. May you all be well and happy in this festive season and New Year 2024!

🌟 Empower Your Mind: Transform Your Inner Dialogue 🌟 Ever feel like your mind is constantly working against you rather than being your ally? I've been there. It's like a broken record, always highlighting what's wrong with you, others, and life, right? But just imagine for a moment how much lighter you'd feel and how much more you could accomplish if you could silence that noise. Ahh, doesn't that thought alone feel incredible?! Believe it or not, it's completely within your reach! Starting on June 10th, you'll have the chance to embark on a six-week journey with the Empower Your Mind program. Here's what's in store: ✨ Diminish the power of your noisy inner critic. ✨ Cultivate your sage to offer guidance and clarity as you navigate life's challenges. ✨ Welcome summer with a mind that supports and uplifts you, rather than sabotaging your progress. Excited? Drop me a message to learn more! This is your chance to harness the uplifting energy of summer and channel it inward, giving yourself a fresh mindset and newfound control over your thoughts. Don't miss out! ✨🧠 #EmpowerYourMind #NewCourse #LPKCoaching #PositiveMindset #SummerTransformation
